description: From Latin defixus, past participle of defigere (“to fix”), from de- + figere (“to fix”).

verbs.description: defix (third-person singular simple present defixes, present participle defixing, simple past and past participle defixed)

entries.meaning: (obsolete) To fix or fasten; to establish.
examples: to defixe their princely seate  […]  in that extreme province
